name: grpstr
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cstr, cop(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))
-| wceq(cplusg, cslot(nat2))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cstr, cop(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))
-| wceq(cplusg, cslot(nat2))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

|- wbr(c0, cstr, cop(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

|- wbr(c0, cstr, cop(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

|- wbr(c0, cstr, cop(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[Struct]< 1, 2 >
⊣ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx), c2 > }

comment: A constructed group is a structure on ` 1 ... 2 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
